alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 6:22AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama, western Miller, southeastern Clay, eastern Randolph, northwestern Lee, Calhoun, Early, northern Seminole and Terrell Counties in southwestern Georgia through 800 AM EST/700 AM CST/... At 721 AM EST/621 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Weston to 6 miles northwest of Blakely. Movement was northeast at 110 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgan, Blakely, Dawson, Cuthbert, Edison, Arlington, Shellman, Columbia, Centerville, Gordon, Bronwood, Parrott, Jakin, Bellville, Bluffton, Parksville, Carnegie, Rock Hill, Dawson Municipal A/P and Chambliss. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST/1000 AM CST/ for southeastern Alabama.
